landing.title: DAILY FANTASY LEAGUES
landing.subtitle: Play whenever you want, wherever your want. Win prizes with no season-long commitment.
landing.info1: Compete with your friends in La Liga, Premier and Champions
landing.info2: Create your lineup, on your computer, tablet or smartphone in seconds

join.title: SING UP
join.description:
Don't you have an EPIC ELEVEN account yet?
Fill out this form.
join.nickrequires: Your nickname must be @MIN_NICKNAME_LENGTH to @MAX_NICKNAME_LENGTH characters long.
join.passrequires: Password: Should be at least @MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH characters. (Type it twice).

login.title: LOG IN
login.loginerror: LOGIN ERROR: The nickname or password is not correct.

changepass.tokenexpired: The provided token is invalid or has expired.
changepass.passrequires: Password: at least @MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH characters. (Type it twice).

rememberpass.title: REMEMBER PASSWORD
rememberpass.confirm_part_1: We have sent you an email to
rememberpass.confirm_part_2: Check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email.
rememberpass.description: Forgot password? Enter you email and you will receive an email to recover your password.
rememberpass.emailrequires: Enter the email address used to sign up for EPIC ELEVEN:

addfunds.title: ADD FUNDS
addfunds.description1: In order to play Epic Eleven with real money, you need to add funds to your account.
addfunds.description2: Don't worry, you can withdraw your money whenever you want for free.
addfunds.paypalinfo: You can add funds using PayPal account. The money will be transferred to Fantasy Sports Games S.L.
